question: A store owner bought a case of 24 shirts for $144. If she sold each shirt for $12, what was her profit on the case in dollars?
If 3/5 of a number is 45, what is 2/3 of the number?
A train travels at a speed of 60 miles per hour. How many miles will it travel in 2 hours and 30 minutes?
If the average (arithmetic mean) of five consecutive integers is 27, what is the largest of these integers?
John can paint a house in 4 hours, while Mary can paint the same house in 6 hours. How many hours would it take them to paint the house together?
A rectangular garden has a length that is twice its width. If the area of the garden is 72 square meters, what is the perimeter of the garden in meters?
If a car depreciates in value by 15% each year, what percentage of its original value will it be worth after 3 years? Round to the nearest percent.
A mixture of 12 liters contains water and alcohol in the ratio 5:1. How many liters of water must be added to make the ratio 8:1?
If 4x + 5y = 43 and 3x - 2y = 4, what is the value of x + y?
A shopkeeper sells an item at a 20% profit. If the selling price is $36, what was the cost price?
